name: Slimewasher
description:
Where is the best place to meet a partner? Exactly! A laundromat.

This is where our little slime went. Can you help him find a perfect partner by join together the right colors. How well is your understanding of the color wheel? And how many slime pairs can you join together within 3 minutes?

Facts:

This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam in 2021 with the theme "joined together" and the second game I ever made. Everything was created in 48 hours except the music.

How To Play?

For this game you only need a mouse. Drag the slime into the washing machine and fill the empty slots by dragging the bottles to them. 

  mixes the colors together and color the slime

    resets the colors

Drag the slime to the colored slime and see if it matches.

Music

Main Menu: Jeremy Blake - Power UP! 
Game: Sef Col - Make it Slow.

Feel free to leave a comment <3
